name: Core Spawn Crawler
languages: understands Deep Speech but can\'t speak

traits.Pack Tactics: The crawler has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the crawler's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.Multiattack: The crawler makes four attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, and one with its tail.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 11+1d4 + 9 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the start of the crawler's next turn.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.Tail: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
